title: Laundry facilities, Clubhouse, Wood-style flooring
map_address: 4485 Pennwood Ave near Pennwood and Arville
posting_body: Want more information on this unit?
Right Where You Want to Be.
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 674 Sq.
Nestled in a residential neighborhood of Las Vegas, Nevada, Woodcreek Apartments puts comfort and convenience at your doorstep.
Our affordable community offers 1, 2, 3 and 4 bedroom apartment homes complete with central air conditioning, a dishwasher and spacious walk-in closets.
Plus features that make you feel right at home like a breakfast bar, fireplace, and your own private patio or balcony.
Step out for some fun at our barbecue areas and playground or take the day to relax and swim in one of our refreshing pools.
And with its convenient location within walking distance of schools and public transit, and a 10 minute drive to major business centers and shopping, Woodcreek is right where you want to be.
Woodcreek is pleased to offer affordable living options (income restrictions apply).
- Less than three miles from the Las Vegas Strip
- Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements
Please visit our website for additional details.
Photos on this ad may not reflect all floorplans.
Advertised pricing and availability are subject to change without notice and cannot be guaranteed.
